mapper.insert: insert all into board values(SEQ_BID.nextval, #{boardType}, #{refMemberUsername}, #{refCategoryId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, sysdate, #{boardDeadline}, default, default) into volunteer values(SEQ_BID.currval,#{volunteerGoalPeople}, #{volunteerLocation}, #{volunteerDate}) into manager values(seq_bid.currval, #{managerName}, #{managerPhone}) select * from dual
insert into attachment values(seq_aid.nextval, #{fileType}, sysdate, #{originalName}, #{renameName}, #{fileLink}, #{level}, default)

insert into image values(
seq_bid.currval,
#{i},
seq_aid.currval)
mapper.select: select count(*) from BOARD where BOARD_TYPE = 'Vol' and BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

select * from BOARD join member on(REF_MEMBER_USERNAME = MEMBER_USERNAME) where BOARD_TYPE = 'Vol' and BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
and REF_CATEGORY_ID = #{category}
and BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by BOARD_ID desc
select * from attachment join image using(attm_id) where file_type = 'Vol' and file_status = 'Y' and ATTM_LEVEL = 0

select * from board join member on(REF_MEMBER_USERNAME = MEMBER_USERNAME) join volunteer on(BOARD_ID = VOLUNTEER.REF_BOARD_ID) join manager on(BOARD_ID = MANAGER.REF_BOARD_ID) join category on(REF_CATEGORY_ID = CATEGORY_ID) where BOARD_ID = #{bId} and BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
select * from Attachment join image using(attm_id) where board_id = #{bId} and file_status = 'Y'
mapper.delete: delete cheer where REF_BOARD_ID = #{boardId} and REF_MEMBER_USERNAME = #{memberUserName}
mapper.update: update attachment set attm_level = 0 where attm_id = (select min(attm_id) from attachment join image using(attm_id) where board_id = #{boardId})
mapper.delete: delete from image where BOARD_ID = #{ boardId } and attm_id = #{ attmId }
mapper.update: update (select FILE_STATUS from attachment join image using(attm_id) where board_id = #{bId}) set FILE_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.delete: delete application where REF_BOARD_ID = #{boardId} and REF_MEMBER_USERNAME = #{MemberUserName}
mapper.insert: insert into message values(seq_mid.nextval, #{refBoardId}, sysdate, #{messageTitle}, #{messageContent}, default, default, #{senderUsername}, #{receiverUsername})
